Hierarch Kekropus:
May your path be blessed by those who walked before you.
I am Kekropus, leader of the Kamaels. I have lived longer, and seen more, than any other living Kamael.
The world has turned many times since we woke from being sealed, and began to once again open our doors to the world. But the resurrection of the goddess of destruction brought an end to all things good.
When the disaster reached the Isle of Souls, we were torn. Should we turn our back on the world once again? Or should we act? That's when we heard the voice. The voice of a giant... our master's voice, on this island.
